content: Credit Card Insurance Asked by AnonymousAsked on 08 May 2019What is the best credit card to pay for prudential insurance premium? I spend roughly $500-800 on card every month.1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Yinghua LiuLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated on 07 Jun 2019UOB one card. 
It will be easy to hit $500 or $1000(if you have other spending) for every month.
Quarterly cashback is awarded on the fourth month and will offset your fourth month credit card bill.And if you have the UOB one account, you already achieved the basic criteria to get the high interest saving account.1 comment1

Clarence Chua09 May 2019If you are looking for cashback rebate, UOB one card will be a good choice or SCB unlimited cashback card is a good option too.

And for UOB one card, as mentioned by ying hua, if you credit your salary with your credit card spendings you will be able to enjoy higher interests up to 3.88% capped at 75k sgd.
